title: Scaling Laws for Neural Language Models beyond 10^27 FLOPs
summary: We investigate scaling behavior of transformer models trained with unprecedented compute budgets. Results suggest continued performance gains with 10^27+ FLOP training runs.

title: BenchAgent: Automated Benchmark Solving via Multi-Step Reasoning
summary: We introduce BenchAgent, achieving 73% on GPQA Diamond through decomposition and tool use. Analysis shows emergent planning capabilities.

title: OSWorld-V2: Expanding Computer Use Benchmarks
summary: Extended OSWorld benchmark with 500 new tasks. Current SOTA models achieve 28% success rate, indicating substantial room for improvement.
